column2: we got two orders of steak frites
column3: an order of brussel sprouts and order of mushrooms. At the waiter's speedy recommendation
column4: I got the dry aged steak
column5: medium. UGH the steak was such a disappointment. Just bland. Maybe it was an off-night for them
column6: but keeping mind it was a $70 steak - it felt like something I could have picked up for $15 at whole foods. Not good.
